title: How do I use the TalkBand B2 as a camera remote?
answer:
Open the camera app on your phone. 

Press and hold the side button on the B2 ans swipe to the camera remote interface. 

Touch the camera icon on the screen to take a picture using your phone/ 

Note: This feature is only available on Huawei handsets running EMUI 2.3 or higher.
